description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin & Parmesan Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Pumpkin & Parmesan Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pumpkin onto a lined baking tray in a single layer. Drizzle with half of the oil and season. Bake for 30 minutes or until tender.
Brush pastry with butter and layer on top of each other on a baking tray, folding in edges. Whisk sour cream with egg in a bowl and stir in parmesan.
Spread over pastry. Top with pumpkin, onion and thyme. Drizzle with remaining oil and bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden. Serve.
